Map of Mesoamerica (MA). The colored areas mark the geographic extent of the major linguistic groups: Mayan (green) in eastern MA and the Huasteca, Mixe-Zoque (blue) in the Isthmus of Tehuantepec region, Nahuatl (red) in central and western MA, Totonac (turquoise) in Veracruz, and Zapotec (yellow) in Oaxaca.
